attributes.action: Abolish additional charges on ticket prices
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to abolish the additional charges on ticket sales for events.
Companies have taken to levying charges labelled by some as convenience charges, on top of the price advertised.
These charges either need to be advertised at the initial point of advertising both online and in the physical realm.
Say no to these extra cost being put on for no apparent reason other than blatant profiteering.
